text_block_list.text:
Halfway through Summer Training Camp. 
It was a day off, but……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ah! There you are, Trainer-san～! 
……wait, huh? Are you in the middle of working?
choice_data_list: Yeah. I wanted to adjust the training menu
Yeah. I wanted to adjust the training menu

text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft was gradually growing stronger during 
Summer Training Camp. As a result, the original 
menu was becoming less and less useful.

For example, just increasing the workload was going to increase 
risk of injury. Safe and efficient. That was what I was focusing on.

……just how long was I working? When I finally 
stretched my arms, my hand bumped in to something.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, good work! If you'd like, drink that!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, you were sitting there mumbling while thinking deeply 
for so long, I was wondering if you were starting to get thirsty.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! ……Ah, that's right! Trainer-san, if you don't mind, 
after this, do you want to go for a walk together?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Together……with this!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I wonder if it's here～ something wonderful～♪ 
I wonder where it could be～ something wonderful～♪
choice_data_list: (So this is how her walks usually go～)

text_block_list.text:
I wanted to see how she took her photos. That's what I was 
thinking, but I didn't think I'd get to see it so soon.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ah! Trainer-san, look at that! 
A jizo statue……wearing a straw hat!
choice_data_list: Haha, the Jizo's got a summer look
Haha, the Jizo's got a summer look

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, isn't it great～!? 
A cute summer find～!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ah, that's right! Trainer-san, why 
don't you try taking one? A picture!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Anything's fine～ 
As long as it moves your heart! ……Here's the camera!

Even though she said that, I stood still for a bit…… 
Seeing how Rhein Kraft was all smiles, naturally――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Hyaah!?
choice_data_list: I see, so something like this!?
I see, so something like this!?

text_block_list.text:
Near the barbeque area, there were 2 human-shaped daikon. Rhein 
Kraft had been pointing her camera at them for nearly two hours.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Hmmm……one more.

That's what I thought while fanning her. She never doubted 
herself, and never let go of what makes her her――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
choice_data_list: Did you take a good one?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ! ……Yeah! Really good!
――She was radiant.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: It was only half a day, but we managed to take alot, huh～.

After our camera walk. We were checking the photos 
we took during the day while waiting for dinner.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
They're all really nice but……Ah! I really like this one! 
This picture that Trainer-san got of a dragonfly!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
It was perched near the power lines with the blue sky 
behind it, it practically screamed 『Summer!』
choice_data_list: Yeah, it came out really well

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
――And moving on! Next is Trainer-san's turn! 
Trainer-san, to you, which one is the best shot?

I started looking through the photos that she had on her computer. 
――Suddenly there was a picture of me on the screen.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Hm? 
What's wrong, Trainer-san……?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ――Ahhh!

This picture was……from this morning. 
Probably when I was making adjustments to the training menu.

There was a really serious look on my face as I was reviewing 
the materials. ……It was just a little embarrassing.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ……I'm sorry for just taking it!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I wasn't planning to originally! 
I was just going to invite you to go on a walk……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
But, well, Trainer-san was in the middle of working. 
And……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
And, for some reason! 
I just couldn't help but watch Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah……Trainer-san, do you remember? 
What you told me before.
『I could see how much you cared about it』
『I could see how much you cared about it』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
On our way home from that workshop where I made that mug…… 
At that time, I was just really happy.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
But, this morning――while reading through all those documents, 
seeing Trainer-san adjust the training menu over and over――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Ah, this is what they meant……that's what came to mind.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
They care……they care about this, with such a 
straight-forward gaze. It was really, really cool……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ――It was exciting.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
……But, well, taking it without asking isn't good. 
Once again, I'm sorry!

While I would say exciting wasn't the right word for it――on that 
day, I was deeply moved by Rhein Kraft's straight-forwardness

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ……Okay! Thank you very much!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: But even then……it's really nice when Trainer-san is like that!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
With that serious look, and your finger resting near 
your mouth! It gives of the feeling of a real 『Pro』! 
I wonder if I can be like that when I grow up～?

Click! I took the laptop from Rhein Kraft. I was happy 
she was praising me but, it really was embarrassing.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Ah! I was still looking at that! 
Give it back～!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
No you c'mon! 
I'm stubborn like that!

The girl that wanted to look at that photo, and 
me that didn't want her to see it. That silly little 
back-and-forth continued for a while longer.
